formatted_address: 101 Irrawaddy Rd, #21-11/12 Royal Square Medical Centre, Singapore 329565
name: Andrea’s Digestive Clinic: Colon | Liver | Gallbladder | GERD | Acid Reflux Specialist

reviews.text:
I would like to express my most sincere thanks to Miss Melly and Dr. Andrea. Their dedication to patient care truly stands out.

Melly’s dedication and genuine care make an incredible difference in ensuring patients feel supported during their visits. Her great dedication to both her job and to the patients is simply amazing. She is always patient, understanding, and genuinely cares about everyone she interacts with. She seems to be very well-liked by most of the patients when I was there for my appointment.

Similarly, Dr. Andrea’s compassion and her efforts to ease patient stress showcase her commitment not only to physical health but also to emotional well-being. It's a privilege to share the experience of healthcare professionals who are so devoted to improving the patient journey.

Once again, thank you so much, Melly and Dr Andrea.

Dr. Andrea & her team are very caring, professional yet helpful. In just two weeks, following a strict diet, I lost more than 10 lbs, and improved my Fatty Liver Disease Blood Test readings. I also felt much better. Dr. Andrea was also professional and patient, in explaining my medical issues clearly to me, and what I needed to do, to improve my health.

Highly recommend Dr. Andrea,
Ms. Su, Ms Melle & team.
Dr. Andrea is incredibly patient and caring, with clear communication and a focus on efficient treatment without unnecessary tests. I fully trust her with my health.
Ms. Su, Ms Melle and team are hardworking, efficient, and compassionate, always quick to respond and take action. Their dedication and professionalism are truly outstanding. If you are looking for honest, very competent and caring Gastroenterologist  - Dr Andrea & her team is the best!

Dr. Andrea is an exceptional healthcare provider renowned for her patient-centered care. She is an attentive listener who takes the time to fully understand her patients' concerns. Dr. Andrea's clear and comprehensive explanations empower patients to actively participate in their healthcare. Unlike many doctors who focus on superficial treatments, she excels at identifying and addressing the root causes of health issues.

Experienced doctor and maintained very cleanliness
Specialist in Gastro, Liver, Colon also much more.
They received many best award certificates from multiple organisations.

vicinity: 101 Irrawaddy Road, #21-11/12 Royal Square Medical Centre
